<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Choral (Choir Angel)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=14)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Choral angels are incredible singers who fill the halls of Nirvana with pious chants and sacred hymns. They form from the souls of talented bards and other performers. While they shy away from conflict, they occasionally brave the mortal realm to deliver good omens and auspicious messages. Choral angels often serve the goddess Shelyn, but they can also serve other good deities and empyreal lords.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Celestial](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Angel_Choral.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Choral](/Monsters.aspx?ID=14)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Angel" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=8" />
<trait label="Celestial" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=23" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 17</row>

**Perception** +14; darkvision

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +16 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 100

**Resistances**
[sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147) 5

**Weaknesses**
evil 5

**Harmonizing Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) 20 feet. Allies in the area gain a +2 status bonus to sonic damage rolls and a +1 status bonus to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects. Enemies in the area take a –2 status penalty to sonic damage rolls and a –1 status penalty to AC and all saves against sonic and auditory effects.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d6+1 bludgeoning plus 1d6 good

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
piercing hymn +17 ([Good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 90 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)),
**Damage** 4d6 sonic damage plus 1d6 good and deafening aria

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 23, attack +13
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Inspire Competence](/Spells.aspx?ID=385), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)
- **1st**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will, self only), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) (at will)
- **3rd**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [Remove Disease](/Spells.aspx?ID=251), [Remove Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=252) (at will), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Divine Rituals** DC 23

- **1st**
[Angelic Messenger](/Rituals.aspx?ID=22)

**Deafening Aria**   On a critical hit with piercing hymn, the target is [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 minute.

**Harmonize** <actions string="Single Action" />  The choral angel adds its harmony to a choral angel ally within its harmonizing aura. The ally can cast [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31) or [_heroism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=149) on its next turn in place of its 3rd-level [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) or heighten its 3rd-level [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) by 1 level. If five different choral angels use Harmonize on the same choral angel ally, it can instead cast [_divine decree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=82) in place of its 3rd-level [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292).

</column>
